subject: [MailServer Notification]Attachment Blocking Notification
body:
The email you have sent contained one or more prohibited attachments. The entire message has been deleted on 6/17/2007 at 5:52:04 AM and was not delivered to any of its recipients.

Message details:

Server: MOOSE
Sender: debian-legal@lists.debian.org;
Recipient: elizabeth.allen@gartner.com;
Subject: Delivery reports about your e-mail
Attachment name: elizabeth.allen@gartner.com.zip

The following URL outlines a supported method to workaround this issue.

http://mercury.gartner.com/mercury/infrastructure_solutions/global_telecom/email_attachment_workaround.htm

This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the person to whom it has been sent, and may contain information that is confidential or legally protected. If you are not the intended recipient or have received this message in error, you are not authorized to copy, distribute, or otherwise use this message or its attachments. Please notify the sender immediately by return e-mail and permanently delete this message and any attachments.  Gartner makes no warranty that this e-mail is error or virus free.
